questions: Is there a man in a yellow suit in the image?
Is there a man in a black sweater in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: one man is wearing a blue suit while the other man is wearing a green sweater?
Is the yellow suit a clothing item worn by one of the men?
Is the black sweater a clothing item worn by one of the men?
model_output:
no There is no man in a yellow suit; a mannequin wears the yellow suit.
no There is no man in a black sweater; the mannequin wears a gray sweater and a yellow suit jacket.
no The image does not depict a man in a blue suit or a green sweater; the man is in a black suit and the mannequin in a yellow jacket over a gray sweater.
no The yellow suit is not worn by a man; it is displayed on a mannequin.
no The black sweater is not present in the image; the mannequin wears a gray sweater.
